name: Spicy Brownies
description: Brought to the Serious Eats Cookie Swap 2009 by Doug Quint and Bryan Petroff. of The Big Gay Ice Cream Truck....
recipeIngredient: About 3/4 teaspoons chipotle blend  and 1/3 teaspoon cayenne

recipeInstructions.text: Make the brownie batter according to the instructions on the back of the box. Mix in the cinnamon, the chipotle blend, and the cayenne. Again refer to the instructions and bake the brownies accordingly.
Note: You can taste the batter and spice to taste, because luckily the batter and cooked product will be about the same level of "heat."
